name: Survive the Night (naiadm)
description:
Spend the night in a cemetery teeming with things that go bump.  

Face and defeat your worst nightmares. 

See you in the morning....maybe. 

Movement: Arrow keys

Fire: Space Bar

Coursera 2D Shooter Demo Game with the following >3 "significant" modifications:

- 3 Levels with progression: new beasties added with each level

- Out of game menus modified

- Player and enemies reskinned

- Sound effects modified for enemy fire

- New background art 

Created By: Diana B
